disclaimer.title: Notice
disclaimer.hobbyText: This is a private hobby project by
disclaimer.purposeText: This app is designed exclusively for learning for flight simulators like Microsoft Flight Simulator. It is not intended for preparation for a real BZF exam.
disclaimer.sourceText: The questions come from the official question catalog of the Federal Network Agency for Electricity, Gas, Telecommunications, Post and Railways (as of 2024). The questions were extracted and grouped from the original PDF using AI.
disclaimer.aiText: This website was built with support from Artificial Intelligence.
disclaimer.privacyText: All data is stored exclusively locally in your browser. No data is transmitted to a backend.
disclaimer.feedbackText: I appreciate feedback from student pilots, (simulator) pilots, and instructors!
disclaimer.languageNote: Exam questions are shown based on the selected variant: BZF (German) or BZF-E (English). The language switch (DE/EN) affects UI texts only.
